PARAM.name: Min. NAS
PARAM.desc: Minimum number of alpha sphere per pocket

PARAM.name: Clust1 Dist
PARAM.desc: Distance criteria for the first step of algorithm

PARAM.name: Clust2 Dist
PARAM.desc: Distance criteria for the second (barycenter) step of algorithm

PARAM.name: Clust3 Dist
PARAM.desc: Distance criteria for the third (multiple linkage) of algorithm

PARAM.name: Clust3 N
PARAM.desc: Number of common vertices criteria for the single linkage algorithm
